ChangeNotes.Value:
v0.9.1 - Major Content Update
[NEW: BAGGAGE TRAIN SYSTEM] - World-state-aware baggage system: accessible in towns/camps when stationary - Unavailable during combat, sieges, pursuits, or when traveling at speed - Quartermaster dialogue for checking baggage status and accessing stored equipment - Baggage status shown in Camp Hub and Company Reports - 'Check Baggage' event triggers when baggage becomes available after travel - Baggage decisions moved to Decisions accordion (separate from daily opportunity limit) - Fixed inventory bugs when checking baggage
[NEW: CONTENT ORCHESTRATOR] - Advanced AI-driven content delivery system that adapts to your playstyle - Background simulation tracks company morale, supplies, and upcoming needs - Smart event selection based on world situation and activity level - Forecast system predicts upcoming events and predicted company needs - 85 new order events across all 16 order types with varied outcomes
[NEW: QUARTERMASTER'S DEAL] - Risk/reward pay option: trade guaranteed pay for lottery chance at equipment - 70% base success rate modified by Quartermaster reputation - Equipment selection weighted by your skills (cavalry get horse gear, archers get bows, etc.) - Items received are exempt from contraband checking - Dynamic success chance shown in tooltip based on Charm skill - Bribe success rate adjusted to 35-55% range (Charm skill matters more)
[NEW: COMBAT LOG] - Comprehensive combat log accessible from encyclopedia - Links to unit entries for detailed information - Filtered conversation view for combat-specific events - Tracks injuries, kills, and battle outcomes
[NEW: RANK PROGRESSION XP] - Combat XP now tracked for enlistment rank progression - XP rewards integrated into order events - Muster reports show XP earned during service period - Validation checks ensure all events properly award XP
[CAMP SYSTEM IMPROVEMENTS] - Added Recap section showing recent events and status changes - Added Forecast section with upcoming events and predictions - Camp routine events with injury system and varied outcomes - Enhanced Camp Hub with better organization and status indicators
[MUSTER SYSTEM REFINEMENTS] - Streamlined muster flow from 8 to 6 stages (removed Recruit and Inspection stages) - Fixed muster day counter showing days served instead of campaign days - Baggage inspection properly exempts Quartermaster's Deal items - Accept Payment in Arrears only shows when lord can't afford to pay - Improved pay menu tooltips with accurate descriptions
[FORMATION ASSIGNMENT FIX] - Fixed formation assignment to properly detect player equipment tier (T1-T6) - T7+ commanders (Master at Arms and above) now correctly control their own party - System reads actual equipped gear instead of using fallback logic
[QUALITY OF LIFE] - Time pauses while equipment/upgrade/provisions screens are open - Time set to normal speed on initial enlistment (not fast forward) - Fixed leave of absence not properly releasing player from lord's party - Fixed quartermaster dialogue flow issues - Fixed upgrade screen closing immediately after conversation - Fixed contraband checking bugs
[TECHNICAL] - Major code quality improvements (500+ Qodana issues resolved) - Comprehensive tooltip system with factual descriptions - Enhanced logging for error catching and diagnostics - Improved save/load persistence for new features - Documentation reorganization and updates
This major update adds deep content systems, intelligent event delivery, and numerous quality improvements for a more immersive enlisted experience.
